constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. WALORSKI:
H.R. 7353.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Section 8 of Article 1 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H4074]

latestAction.text: ASSUMING FIRST SPONSORSHIP - Mr. Walberg asked unanimous consent that he may hereafter be considered as the first sponsor of H.R. 7353 a bill originally introduced by Representative Walorski, for the purpose of adding cosponsors and requesting reprintings pursuant to clause 7 of rule XII. Agreed to without objection.

title: Telehealth Benefit Expansion for Workers Act of 2022
